name: Plot of the Pot
description: We killin' flowers baby!! Aight, lookie here, 3 of the 12 flowers have a virus and it's your job to root em' out, and shred... I mean... find a cure for them. No time limit, but if you destroy... I mean... cure 3 flowers that aren't infected, it's game over. Good Luck, and be smarter than a plant.
